channel.title: Mage running to player
channel.description:
I am running a 317 server off of soulsplit's source. I have fixed a lot of issues but I just can't seem to fix this. For some reason when i mage another player i run towards him, but if i autocast i dont. Also the mage works fine on NPCS. Range is fully working.
here is my combatassistant class [url=http://pastebin.com/BiE5ziT5]http://pastebin.com/BiE5ziT5[/url] and my attackplayer class [url=http://pastebin.com/rnZej3Sf]http://pastebin.com/rnZej3Sf[/url]
thanks for helping in advance guys. This is the last major fix i need for my server. :confused: :confused:

item.title: Mage running to player
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

I don’t know what you’re doing wrong. I never looked at your classes, but if range works, then why don’t you just take the range if condition C&P it to your attack with magic method or whatever and change the rage condition to magic?

Read full topic

item.title: Mage running to player
item.dc:creator: @wemissedu wemissedu
item.description:
@wemissedu wrote:

I added the if/else and it didnt change anything. I dont understand what im doing is wrong. It works on NPCs and range works. Why wont range? can u show me over skype what i am doing wrong?

Read full topic

it doesn’t have the other if condition I stated; but I guess.

if(!checkMagicReqs(c.spellId)) { c.stopMovement(); resetPlayerAttack(); return;

item.dc:creator: @wemissedu wemissedu
item.description:
@wemissedu wrote:

could you help me with that. if you look in my code i have an if using mage stop movement if/else. Like could u make an example of what i need to change from that?

Read full topic

item.title: Mage running to player
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

add an if condition, if the person is using magic on another player, stop movement, if auto retaliate is on & player is out of casting range, follow until in casting range or the attacking entity stops attacking.

Read full topic
